title: Three Secretaries re-appointed
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The President’s Media Division announced that three Secretaries have been re-appointed to the Ministry of Defence, Public Security, and Ministry of Finance.
Ex-PM Rajapaksa relocated to Trinco Naval Dockyard & will be protected as long as he lives – Defence Secretary
Police notice to GotaGoGama protestors using PA system at President’s Office
Political stability is paramount for economic revival, says CBSL Chief while hinting resignation if political stability is NOT achieved
